alert.note: Alert for Garland; Montgomery; Perry; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 8:13PM CDT until May 19 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Garland County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Yell County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fourche Valley to 8 miles east of Muddy Creek WMA to near Oden, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Oden... Mauldin... Fourche Valley... Muddy Creek WMA... Avant... Chula... Gibbs... Pencil Bluff... Crystal Springs Landing... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Bluffton... Lena Landing Rec Area... Silver... Onyx... Fourche Mountain Recreation Are... Sims... Briggsville... Story... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
